sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-resume', templateUrl: './resume.component.html', styleUrls: ['./resume.component.scss'] }) export class ResumeComponent { @Input() title:string = "Résumé de la journée "; }

{{title}}

Quelques mots sur la journée d'hier


Lola Caillaud

Hello my name is Lola caillaud, apprentice project manager and developer for 3 years now. I have been working at PandaERP for 3 years, on a work-study basis (software publisher) I am currently taking the "Application Designer Developer" training (bac+3), provided by the Bordeaux CESI.

This guarantees continuity with the "IT Developer" diploma that I obtained in 2022 and will allow me to consolidate my IT skills and knowledge. I want to finalize my studies with the master's degree "Managing the IT department, organizing and managing projects") piloted by the CESI to become a project manager.

1 min
